Related Research
----------------
| `Machine learning for perturbational single-cell omics <https://linkinghub.elsevier.com/retrieve/pii/S2405471221002027>`_.
| `scGen predicts single-cell perturbation responses <https://doi.org/10.1038/s41592-019-0494-8>`_.
| `Cell type prioritization in single-cell data <https://doi.org/10.1038/s41587-020-0605-1>`_.
| `Generative modeling of single-cell time series with PRESCIENT enables prediction of cell trajectories with interventions <https://doi.org/10.1038/s41467-021-23518-w>`_.
| `muscat detects subpopulation-specific state transitions from multi-sample multi-condition single-cell transcriptomics data <https://doi.org/10.1038/s41467-020-19894-4>`_.
| `scCODA: A Bayesian model for compositional single-cell data analysis <https://www.biorxiv.org/content/10.1101/2020.12.14.422688v2>`_.
| `Milo: differential abundance testing on single-cell data using k-NN graphs <https://www.biorxiv.org/content/10.1101/2020.11.23.393769v1>`_.
